  Column
-------------------------------------
  
  This dashboard queries ClinicalTrials.gov. Input your disease, and the output will be a meta-analysis.
  
```{r}
  textInput("disease", "Disease")
  #renderText({ input$disease })
  
  textInput("drug", "Drug")
  #renderText({ input$drug })
```
  
```{r}
joy = read.csv("ebmental-2019-November-22-4-153-inline-supplementary-material-1.txt")
library("meta")
library("metasens")

settings.meta(digits = 2)

m.publ = metabin(resp.h, resp.h + fail.h, resp.p, resp.p + fail.p,
                 data = joy, studlab = paste0(author, " (", year, ")"),
                 method.tau = "PM")

print(m.publ)

```

  Column
-------------------------------------

```{r}

# png("~/Desktop/small.png", width = 600, height = 400)
forest(m.publ, sortvar = year, prediction = TRUE,
       label.left = "Left label", label.right = "Right label")
```
